name: Superstition S3
storyline:
Purgatory, the land of death and the origins of supernatural beings. Also, the place you find yourself in. Your past unravels as all the pieces you lacked in the past suddenly appear at your feet. Answers you never thought you would get now find themselves within your grasp. But that doesn’t mean you know what to do with them. Though your past is no longer a mystery, your future is. And it does not look bright. Another prophecy comes into play, and bonds are tested, strengthened, and broken.

If you thought everything in your past was the real test, then you were wrong. You are now officially in this life. There is no going back. There is no place for regrets and second thoughts. In a world as big as yours, will you be the prey or the predator?
